originalText.text:
I have had an amazing experience working with Inna Fershteyn, a trust and estate attorney in NY. Dealing with the probate process during a time after my relative's death has been physically and emotionally exhausting. Especially with me living outside of NY and therefore being unaware of the process.
That's why it was so important to find someone trustworthy and dependable to help me in this situation... That someone was Inna Fershteyn.
What makes her stand out is her attentiveness and accessibility. She was unlike the other attorneys I have worked with before, because of her amazing communication. Whether it's through email responses, text messages or brief conversations Inna and her team consistently deliver great service! I recommend her without any hesitation!!!

text.text:
I have had an amazing experience working with Inna Fershteyn, a trust and estate attorney in NY. Dealing with the probate process during a time after my relative's death has been physically and emotionally exhausting. Especially with me living outside of NY and therefore being unaware of the process.
That's why it was so important to find someone trustworthy and dependable to help me in this situation... That someone was Inna Fershteyn.
What makes her stand out is her attentiveness and accessibility. She was unlike the other attorneys I have worked with before, because of her amazing communication. Whether it's through email responses, text messages or brief conversations Inna and her team consistently deliver great service! I recommend her without any hesitation!!!

originalText.text: I have been an intern at this law office since the beginning of July and can attest that it is a collaborative and encouraging work environment. Inna and her team are extremely diligent and detail-oriented when handling cases. When interacting with clients, they are respectful and accommodating, taking their time to explain all legal options available and recommending the best course of action. I have worked on articles pertaining to building a comprehensive estate plan and worked on cases dealing with estate administration and probate proceedings. I have also seen a great deal of positive feedback from satisfied clients and former interns of the law office. Inna is a wonderful mentor for anyone seeking a career in the legal field, and she and her team are the best asset you can have in your corner when it comes to building an estate plan.

originalText.text: I've been an intern for Inna since June and I have to say that she's a great mentor for anyone interested in pursuing law or even just curious about it. I work on articles relating to estate planning and asset protection issues, and Inna makes sure that you not only know what you're talking about but also understand it through application. I'd highly recommend this trust and estate planning law office for all of your legal needs and training before becoming a lawyer!

text.text: I've been an intern for Inna since June and I have to say that she's a great mentor for anyone interested in pursuing law or even just curious about it. originalText.text: This law office has been a go to place for my family for years.  Inna did a trust for my parents, grandparents and set up an LLC for my dad and did management agreement for his company as well.  At this point going to this law office so like going to a family physician- Inna is a “trust doctor” for us and has been a friend and a confidant in every legal and business situation.  I have to say one of the best Trust and Estate attorneys in NY.

originalText.text: Best Trust attorney out there!! She helped me create an irrevocable trust for a family member and was extremely accommodating. She is very knowledgeable on trusts and made sure to explain all aspects for me and my family. If you need a trust attorney go to Inna Fershteyn you will not be disappointed.
